user.title: Update Grist Options
user.description: Update the configuration options for Grist.

data_description.grist_manual: Set the manual grid boost value as a percentage (5-99%, suggest 50).
data_description.grist_start: Set the time to start grid boost (suggest 0).
data_description.grist_end: Set the time to end grid boost (suggest 6).
data_description.update_hour: Set the hour of the day to perform updates (0-23, suggest 22).
data_description.history_days: Number of days of load history to use for calculations (1-10 days, suggest 4).
data_description.minimum_soc: Set the minimum state of charge (SOC) value as a percentage (5-99%, suggest 15).

confirm_off.title: Confirm Disable Time of Use
confirm_off.description: Setting boost_mode to 'off' will disable the inverter's Time of Use system. Please confirm.

data.confirm_off: Confirm disabling Time of Use system

data_description.confirm_off: Check this box to confirm disabling the inverter's Time of Use system.
